Directions: In a mixing bowl, combine the eggs, baby food, oil and buttermilk.  Combine dry ingredients; add to the egg mixture and beat just until moistened. Transfer to two greased 9-in. x 5-in. x 3-in. loaf pans.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 60-65 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.  Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks.
Ingredients: 2 (6 ounce) jars plum or plum with apples baby food
